contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox French commune |name = Xaintrailles |region = [[Aquitaine]] |image = Xaintrailles église.JPG |department = [[Lot-et-Garonne]] |arrondissement = [[Arrondissement of Nérac]] |canton = [[Canton of Lavardac]] |INSEE = 47327 |postal code = 47230 |mayor = Gilles Lespes |term = 2000–2008 |intercommunality = [[Communauté de communes du Val d'Albret]] |longitude = 0.2589 |latitude = 44.2064 |elevation m = 210 |elevation min m = 80 |elevation max m = 196 |area km2 = 10.26 |population = 380 |population date = 2006 }} ''' Xaintrailles ''' is a [[Communes of France|commune]] in the [[Lot-et-Garonne]] [[Departments of France|department]] in south-western [[France]]. ==See also== *[[Communes of the Lot-et-Garonne department]] {{Commons category|Xaintrailles}} {{Lot-et-Garonne communes}} [[Category:Communes of Lot-et-Garonne]] {{LotGaronne-geo-stub}}
